headline: The 5 Most Interesting Analyst Questions From Allegion’s Q4 Earnings Call
summary: Allegion's fourth quarter results were met with a negative market reaction, reflecting cautious sentiment around its weaker-than-expected performance in key segments. Management highlighted that while Americas nonresidential business continued to show resilience, the residential side ended the year softer than anticipated, with CEO John H. Stone noting, “resi in the Americas ended the year softer than we had contemplated.” Electronics and acquisition-driven growth partially offset these headwind
